inference_result.call_summary: Carl Lucas called Sleepaway Camp Hotel to report a lost credit card. The agent checked the lost and found, found the card, and arranged to mail it to Carl. The agent also offered a 10% discount on his next stay.
inference_result.overall_call_sentiment_summary: The caller started concerned but became relieved and appreciative. The agent was helpful and reassuring throughout.
inference_result.caller_sentiment_summary: The caller was initially concerned about the lost card but became relieved and appreciative when the agent found it and offered a discount.
inference_result.agent_sentiment_summary: The agent was helpful and reassuring throughout the call.
